class.rdfs:comment: A service provided by a government organization, e.g. food stamps, veterans benefits, etc.
class.rdfs:label: GovernmentService

schema:serviceOperator.rdfs:comment: The operating organization, if different from the provider.  This enables the representation of services that are provided by an organization, but operated by another organization like a subcontractor.
schema:serviceOperator.rdfs:label: serviceOperator
